> [anonimoose](#comment_33_1E5pgBaKNzFU9Loeg7eDGrSkXqJAqbySrJ): i've only briefly looked into it and only then cloned a blog to try, I am mostly a back end developer so I would read up on the documentation

Yeah I played around with site creation on ZeroNet a bit and it's pretty straightforward; create whatever you want in vue or react or simple bootstrap html, then webpack it and you're done. Need to read up on how data is distributed among zn-clients, and how to minimize storage impact.
This is really fun stuff!
